description: Micro socks for mega adventures. These minimalist socks use a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Light Micro Socks - Women's
